summary: The United Kingdom, or UK, is a country in Europe with a rich history. It includes England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland. With a population of nearly 68 million, it is a powerful country with a strong economy and global influence. The UK has a long history, dating back to the Neolithic period. It has been a constitutional monarchy and parliamentary democracy since the 1700s. London, its capital, is a large and influential city. The UK was the first industrialized country and once had a vast empire. While it has faced challenges, it remains a major power with a permanent seat on the UN Security Council.
title: United Kingdom
